destinations.name: Taj Mahal, Agra, India
destinations.description: The Taj Mahal is an ivory-white marble mausoleum and a UNESCO World Heritage Site, renowned for its stunning architecture and romantic history.

Evening: Mehtab Bagh for Sunset View (2 hours)

destinations.name: Varanasi, Uttar Pradesh, India
destinations.description: Varanasi, one of the oldest living cities in the world, is famous for its ghats along the Ganges River and rich spiritual heritage.

Morning: Ganga Aarti at Dashashwamedh Ghat (2 hours)

destinations.name: Golden Temple, Amritsar, India
destinations.description: The Golden Temple is a spiritual and cultural landmark known for its stunning architecture and the community kitchen that serves free meals to thousands.

destinations.name: Leh-Ladakh, Jammu & Kashmir, India
destinations.description: Leh-Ladakh is known for its breathtaking landscapes, Buddhist monasteries, and adventure activities.

destinations.name: Dal Lake, Srinagar, India
destinations.description: Dal Lake is famous for its stunning houseboats and shikara rides, surrounded by the majestic Himalayan mountains.

Morning: Shikara Ride on Dal Lake (2 hours)
Visit Tulip Garden (if in season) (2 hours)

destinations.name: Jaipur, Rajasthan, India
destinations.description: Jaipur, also known as the Pink City, is famous for its historic forts, palaces, and vibrant bazaars.

Evening: Dinner at a Traditional Rajasthani Restaurant (2 hours)

destinations.name: Jaisalmer, Rajasthan, India
destinations.description: Jaisalmer, known as the Golden City, is famous for its stunning sandstone architecture and desert landscapes.

Evening: Cultural Evening at Desert Camp (2 hours)
Dinner at a Rooftop Restaurant (1.5 hours)

destinations.name: Udaipur, Rajasthan, India
destinations.description: Udaipur, known as the City of Lakes, is famous for its palaces, lakes, and romantic boat rides.

Evening: Boat Ride on Lake Pichola (2 hours)
Dinner at a Lakeside Restaurant (1.5 hours)

destinations.name: Rishikesh, Uttarakhand, India
destinations.description: Rishikesh is known as the Yoga Capital of the World and is famous for its spiritual retreats and adventure activities like river rafting.

Morning: Ganga Aarti at Triveni Ghat (1.5 hours)

Evening: Dinner at a Local Café (1.5 hours)

destinations.name: Jim Corbett National Park, Uttarakhand, India
destinations.description: Jim Corbett National Park is India's oldest national park, renowned for its diverse flora and fauna, including the Bengal tiger.

destinations.name: Khajuraho, Madhya Pradesh, India
destinations.description: Khajuraho is famous for its stunning temples adorned with intricate sculptures and carvings depicting various aspects of life.

Morning: Visit Western Group of Temples (3 hours)
Visit Eastern Group of Temples (3 hours)
Evening: Attend Light and Sound Show (2 hours)
Dinner at a Local Restaurant (1.5 hours)

destinations.name: Ranthambore National Park, Rajasthan, India
destinations.description: Ranthambore National Park is famous for its tiger population and stunning landscapes, offering safari experiences.

destinations.name: Hawa Mahal, Jaipur, Rajasthan, India
destinations.description: Hawa Mahal, also known as the Palace of Winds, is an iconic structure in Jaipur known for its unique façade and intricate latticework.

Evening: Dinner at a Traditional Rajasthani Restaurant (1.5 hours)

destinations.name: Varanasi, Uttar Pradesh, India
destinations.description: Varanasi, one of the oldest cities in the world, is famous for its ghats, temples, and spiritual significance.

Morning: Boat Ride on the Ganges (2 hours)

Evening: Dinner at a Local Restaurant (1.5 hours)

destinations.name: Jaisalmer, Rajasthan, India
destinations.description: Jaisalmer, known as the Golden City, is famous for its stunning forts, havelis, and desert landscapes.

destinations.name: Coorg, Karnataka, India
destinations.description: Coorg, also known as Kodagu, is famous for its lush green landscapes, coffee plantations, and pleasant weather.

Evening: Dinner at a Local Restaurant (1.5 hours)
Dinner at a Local Restaurant (1.5 hours)

destinations.name: Fatehpur Sikri, Uttar Pradesh, India
destinations.description: Fatehpur Sikri, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, is famous for its stunning Mughal architecture and historical significance as the former capital of the Mughal Empire.

Evening: Dinner at a Local Restaurant (1.5 hours)
Dinner at a Local Restaurant (1.5 hours)

Morning: Visit the Tomb of Salim Chishti (1.5 hours)
Evening: Dinner at a Local Restaurant (1.5 hours)

destinations.name: Gulmarg, Jammu & Kashmir, India
destinations.description: Gulmarg is known for its picturesque meadows, skiing opportunities, and the scenic Gulmarg Gondola, one of the highest cable cars in the world.

Evening: Dinner at a Local Restaurant (1.5 hours)
Dinner at a Local Restaurant (1.5 hours)

Morning: Nature Walk at Gulmarg Biosphere Reserve (2 hours)
Evening: Dinner at a Local Restaurant (1.5 hours)

destinations.name: Manali, Himachal Pradesh, India
destinations.description: Manali is a popular hill station known for its stunning landscapes, adventure activities, and vibrant culture.

Evening: Dinner at a Local Restaurant (1.5 hours)
Dinner at a Local Restaurant (1.5 hours)

Morning: Nature Walk at Kullu Valley (2 hours)
Evening: Dinner at a Local Restaurant (1.5 hours)

destinations.name: Shimla, Himachal Pradesh, India
destinations.description: Shimla, the summer capital of British India, is renowned for its colonial architecture, scenic beauty, and pleasant weather.

Evening: Dinner at a Local Restaurant (1.5 hours)
Dinner at a Local Restaurant (1.5 hours)
Dinner at a Local Restaurant (1.5 hours)

destinations.name: Amarnath, Jammu & Kashmir, India
destinations.description: Amarnath is famous for its annual pilgrimage to the Amarnath Cave, where a naturally occurring ice Shiva Linga is worshipped.

Relax at a Local Tent (1.5 hours)

destinations.name: Sunderbans, West Bengal, India
destinations.description: Sunderbans is a UNESCO World Heritage Site known for its mangrove forests, the Royal Bengal Tiger, and rich biodiversity.

Morning: Boat Ride in the Mangroves (3 hours)
Evening: Dinner at a Local Resort (1.5 hours)

destinations.name: Kaziranga National Park, Assam, India
destinations.description: Kaziranga National Park is a UNESCO World Heritage Site famous for its population of the Indian one-horned rhinoceros.

Evening: Dinner at a Local Resort (1.5 hours)
Relax at a Local Resort (1.5 hours)

destinations.name: Meghalaya Caves, India
destinations.description: Meghalaya is known for its stunning limestone caves, including Siju, Liat Prah, and Mawsmai Caves, offering thrilling spelunking experiences.

destinations.name: Rann of Kutch, Gujarat, India
destinations.description: The Rann of Kutch is a vast salt desert famous for its unique landscape, wildlife, and the vibrant Rann Utsav festival.

destinations.name: Gir National Park, Gujarat, India
destinations.description: Gir National Park is the only habitat of the Asiatic lion, offering a unique opportunity to see these majestic animals in the wild.

destinations.name: Hampi, Karnataka, India
destinations.description: Hampi is a UNESCO World Heritage Site known for its stunning ruins, ancient temples, and breathtaking landscapes.

destinations.description: Mysore Palace is a historical palace and a significant cultural landmark, renowned for its stunning architecture and rich history.

destinations.name: Ajanta and Ellora Caves, Maharashtra, India
destinations.description: Ajanta and Ellora Caves are UNESCO World Heritage Sites known for their stunning rock-cut architecture and ancient Buddhist, Hindu, and Jain temples.

destinations.name: Nainital, Uttarakhand, India
destinations.description: Nainital is a popular hill station known for its beautiful lakes, scenic views, and pleasant weather, making it a perfect getaway.

Morning: Boat Ride on Naini Lake (2 hours)
Evening: Dinner at a Local Restaurant (1.5 hours)
Relax at a Local Resort (1.5 hours)

destinations.name: Marina Beach, Chennai
destinations.description: Marina Beach is the longest urban beach in India, known for its golden sands, vibrant atmosphere, and iconic landmarks.

Morning: Tamil Nadu Science and Technology Centre

Evening: Enjoy street food along the beach

destinations.name: Theni, Tamil Nadu
destinations.description: Theni is a picturesque district known for its scenic landscapes, hills, and agricultural richness. It's a gateway to the Western Ghats and is famous for its pleasant climate.

destinations.name: Madurai, Tamil Nadu
destinations.description: Madurai is one of the oldest cities in India, known for its rich cultural heritage, ancient temples, and vibrant street life. The city is famous for the Meenakshi Amman Temple and its historical significance.

Evening: Cultural performance at a local venue

destinations.name: Kanyakumari, Tamil Nadu
destinations.description: Kanyakumari is located at the southernmost tip of India, where the Bay of Bengal, Arabian Sea, and Indian Ocean meet. It is known for its stunning sunrise and sunset views, Vivekananda Rock Memorial, and rich cultural heritage.

destinations.name: Ooty, Tamil Nadu
destinations.description: Ooty, also known as Udhagamandalam, is a picturesque hill station located in the Nilgiri Hills. It is famous for its scenic landscapes, tea gardens, and pleasant climate, making it a favorite tourist destination.

destinations.name: Kodaikanal, Tamil Nadu
destinations.description: Kodaikanal, often referred to as the 'Princess of Hill Stations,' is a charming destination in the Western Ghats. It is known for its misty hills, serene lakes, and vibrant flora.

destinations.name: Mahabalipuram, Tamil Nadu
destinations.description: Mahabalipuram, known for its ancient temples and rock-cut monuments, is a UNESCO World Heritage site on the Coromandel Coast. It is famous for its Shore Temple, Arjuna's Penance, and intricate stone carvings.

destinations.name: Thanjavur, Tamil Nadu
destinations.description: Thanjavur is a historical city known for its grand temples, classical art forms, and rich heritage. The Brihadeeswarar Temple, a UNESCO World Heritage site, is one of the most significant landmarks in the city.

destinations.name: Rameshwaram, Tamil Nadu
destinations.description: Rameshwaram is one of the holiest places in India, known for its sacred temples, especially the Ramanathaswamy Temple. It is also a gateway to explore stunning beaches and religious landmarks.

destinations.name: Murudeshwar, Karnataka
destinations.description: Murudeshwar is a coastal town in Karnataka, famous for its majestic Shiva statue and serene beaches. It’s a perfect blend of religious and natural attractions.

Evening: Back to Murudeshwar for Dinner by the Beach
